channel.title: AKA.SND - Sketch 34 ('Lo-Fi Beats #1') [Lo-Fi Hip-Hop, Chillhop]
channel.description:
[AKA.SND - Sketch 34 ('Lo-Fi Beats #1')](https://soundcloud.com/akasnd/sketch-34-lofi-beats-no1)
Little Lo-Fi Hip-Hop/Chillhop groove thang. Just a little bit of fun.
I'll probably add a smooth jazzy solo at some point.
  Enjoy :)

item.title: AKA.SND - Sketch 34 ('Lo-Fi Beats #1') [Lo-Fi Hip-Hop, Chillhop]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Thanks for the comments. Appreciated.

It was only a matter of time before an old hip-hopper like me did something like this.

 

iammane:

You have GOT to get someone to lay down a rap over this lol

I know. Every time that ‘A-yo’ kicks in, you can just feel the flow should start.
(I put it there specifically to create that instinct; teasing myself.)

I want to add an electric keys solo, or maybe retro synth lead solo; but I might also consider putting out feelers for someone to run a flow over parts of it.

 

The only thing I might do is turn down the volume on the clap/snare sound. Every now and then it comes in a little loud but it might just be me.

No, you’re right. The first instance used Softs, but I neglected to use them for the second instance. I’d noticed it, but didn’t have the chance to fix it till now. (Fixed)

(I also extended the bars at the end, give a bit more time with the vibe ahead of the vinyl outro.)

Read full topic

item.title: AKA.SND - Sketch 34 ('Lo-Fi Beats #1') [Lo-Fi Hip-Hop, Chillhop]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
AYYYY YO

You have GOT to get someone to lay down a rap over this lol. This is awesome. I’m no rap guru but this is exuding an awesome west coast vibe to me. The gritty bass is such a good fit. Ahhhh so good. The only thing I might do is turn down the volume on the clap/snare sound. Every now and then it comes in a little loud but it might just be me. Awesome outro too lol.

Stellar!

Read full topic
